response.explain: The error message indicates that the robot is not within four meters of the fridge, which is why it cannot open the fridge. The robot needs to move closer to the fridge before it can interact with it.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take out the chocolates from the fridge
(4) Put the chocolates into the shopping cart
(5) Move to the checkout counter
(6) Checkout the chocolates

def act(robot,env,camera):
